string.text: Ghost's waiting for me at the Polissya hotel - room #26. We need to meet and discuss the plan of further actions.
According to the Ghost meeting's results, I'll need to get to the Sarcophagus and find the security override codes so the Generators can be shut down. That clearly won't be an easy trip...

I've received an SOS signal: the local military can't handle the Monolithians onslaught and are requesting backup. I'm not sure I should step into this whole thing considering what I inflicted at the Radar...
Alright, it seems like the fanatics are dealt with. Now I'll need to meet the local military commander, Vasilev, to get some gratitude. But perhaps I shouldn't?..

Well, this Vasilev man seems alright! He sent me to the local Ecologists base: they need to perform some measurements. I don't know if it's worth doing all this... but since I've agreed - I need to get it done anyway.

The local scientific base's head asked me to protect a field agent as he takes measurements to find out what's causing hallucinations in a nearby area. After the operation, I must report to him about the results.
